title: WTB: a T3 beater...I mean a real dog
author: conor912

posts.post_title: WTB: a T3 beater...I mean a real dog
posts.post_content: Don't care about the player or condition. If you have one you've been using as a door mat or a drink coaster, that will work perfectly. I'm just looking for an uber cheap $30-40 example. Thanks.
